code: @Override public Format<?> build(FormattingOptions formattingOptions) {     return characterFormat. }
public String format(Character object) throws Exception {     return object.toString(). }

public Character parse(String string) throws Exception {     if (string.length() > 1) {         throw new ParseException("The string \"" + string + "\" cannot be parsed to a character (size > 1).", 1).     }     return string.charAt(0). }
